alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 20 at 6:31PM PST until January 22 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding. * WHERE...San Francisco, North Bay Interior Valleys and San Francisco Bay Shoreline Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 10 AM PST Sunday, 7 AM to 11 AM Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tidal levels are running up to 0.75 foot higher than tidal predictions. High tide will peak about 07:33 am PST Sunday and 08:23 am PST Monday resulting in minor coastal flooding for low-lying, flood-prone spots adjacent to the San Francisco Bay.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline
